intervalcalendarinput.description:
IntervalCalendarInput connects an IntervalCalendar instance with two text
input fields containing to the lower and upper dates of the interval.
intervalcalendarinput.requires: yahoo, dom, event, element, calendar, intervalcalendar
intervalcalendarinput.name: intervalcalendarinput

YAHOO.BLARGON.widget.IntervalCalendarInp.name: YAHOO.BLARGON.widget.IntervalCalendarInput

lower_input.description: Input field for lower date. Must be set on instantiation.

upper_input.description: Input field for upper date. Must be set on instantiation.

constructors.description:
IntervalCalendarInput instantiates an IntervalCalendar and associates it with two specified input fields which contain the lower and upper dates of the interval. The states of the IntervalCalendar and text inputs are kept in sync as the user interacts.

The format of the date strings in the input fields depends on the localization settings of the IntervalCalendar instance.

params.name: event
params.description: An object containing the previous attribute value and the new value.

upper_inputChange.name: upper_inputChange
upper_inputChange.description: Fires when the value for the configuration attribute 'upper_input' changes.

params.name: event
params.description: An object containing the previous attribute value and the new value.

beforeLower_inputChange.name: beforeLower_inputChange
beforeLower_inputChange.description: Fires before the value for the configuration attribute 'lower_input' changes. Return false to cancel the attribute change.

params.name: event
params.description: An object containing the previous attribute value and the new value.

lower_inputChange.name: lower_inputChange
lower_inputChange.description: Fires when the value for the configuration attribute 'lower_input' changes.

params.name: event
params.description: An object containing the previous attribute value and the new value.

beforeUpper_inputChange.name: beforeUpper_inputChange
beforeUpper_inputChange.description: Fires before the value for the configuration attribute 'upper_input' changes. Return false to cancel the attribute change.

_getDateString.description: Constructs localized date string from date object.

_getDateRegExp.description:
Constructs regular expression for date strings based on localization
settings of IntervalCalendar.

return.description: A date object if string was valid; null otherwise.

_parseDate.description: Parses localized date string into date object, if valid.

YAHOO.BLARGON.widget.IntervalCalendarInp.description:
IntervalCalendarInput instantiates an IntervalCalendar and associates it with two specified input fields which contain the lower and upper dates of the interval. The states of the IntervalCalendar and text inputs are kept in sync as the user interacts.

The format of the date strings in the input fields depends on the localization settings of the IntervalCalendar instance.
